New Records: Myles Turner surpassed 8,000 career points in the win
Key Match Events: Myles Turner scored a season-high 30 points and grabbed 11 rebounds
Tyrese Haliburton finished with 25 points and a season-high 12 assists
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Rick Carlisle praised Turner's growth as a rim roller alongside Tyrese Haliburton
Turner's chemistry with Haliburton was highlighted as a key factor in the Pacers' offense
Post-Match Reflections: Myles Turner credited his consistency to his commitment to his body and his career
Turner expressed his desire to stay ready and be an example for the next generation
Miscellaneous Highlights: Myles Turner's shooting has been efficient, with 46.7% from the field and 36.8% from beyond the arc
The Pacers' opponents respect the complete package Turner presents as a threat
